text: @replouiegohmert I’m glad you don’t have symptoms, but for the love of YOUR god stop being a fucking racist. It’s the Coronavirus. You racists never miss a chance to show your true colors. It’s not the wuhan anything. Also, yes, even my 14 year old knows not to touch the front of her mask. 🙄😷
